function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Production and distribution of face masks during a contagious disease outbreak","Impact":"Potential for ineffective protection against the spread of contagious diseases if masks are not designed for proper filtration","Mitigation":"Ensure that face masks are designed with appropriate filtration capabilities and meet safety standards","Technologies":"Filtering materials, testing equipment for filtration efficiency","People":"Workers involved in production and distribution, general public","Owner":"Manufacturers, health organizations"},{"Description":"Air pollution and its impact on public health","Impact":"Risk of respiratory diseases and other health issues due to poor air quality","Mitigation":"Improve air quality through reducing emissions, implementing air quality monitoring, and promoting public health awareness","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring devices, emission control technologies","People":"Residents of polluted areas, public health organizations","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations"}]}
